rules: 1. Advance Booking Windows • Members, Dependents, and Parents may book up to 180 days (6 months) in advance. Groups 10 to 19 rooms only on general Weekdays in Blocks A and C 180 days in advance • Members accompanied by Guests may book up to 90 days in advance. • Unaccompanied Guests (Temporary Members) may book up to 60 days in advance. Parents of Members and spouses’ parents and member’s children aged above 10 enjoy the same 180-day booking privilege but are treated as Temporary Members for billing and records. 2. Booking Procedure All booking requests must follow the three-step confirmation process: 1. Check the website calendar for availability 2. Check availability by phone with the Booking Office. 3. Submit a duly filled Room Booking Form along with an email to bookings@clubmahabaleshwar.net. Only after receipt of both completed form and an email will a booking be considered valid. This ensures transparency and fairness in room allocation. 3. Room Eligibility & Allocation • Weekdays (Sun–Thu): Up to 6 rooms per Member (including Temporary Members). • Weekends / Long Weekends: 1 room for self/dependents + 2 rooms for Temporary Members (maximum 3). Diwali and Christmas, only for members, no Temporary members • Unaccompanied Temporary Members: Maximum 3 rooms per booking. • Children under 10 years are not eligible for separate rooms; those aged 11–21 are treated as Dependents. • Maids/attendants/nurses are not considered guests and will not be allotted separate rooms. 4. Special Room Features (Subject to Pre-booking & Availability) Subject to availability, the Club offers Pet-Friendly, Wheelchair accessible, and Single Occupancy, rooms with four beds and AC whose usage is subject to an extra charge of ₹1,000. 5. Senior Citizen Benefits Members aged 65 years and above enjoy a 10% discount on room tariffs across weekdays and weekends. 6. Group Booking Policy • Definition: A booking of 10 or more rooms (maximum 19) for 2–5 nights. • Restrictions: Not permitted during Diwali (17 Oct–2 Nov 2025), Christmas/New Year (19 Dec 2025–4 Jan 2026), or declared long weekends. • Deposit: ₹20,000 payable at confirmation; balance on check-in. • Guest List: Names, ages, and meal preference must be emailed at least 15 days before arrival. • Allocation Cap: Capped at 10 rooms in C Block (Old + New) and 9 rooms in A Block. 7. Room Cancellation & Modification Policy ... (full policy from DOCX, abbreviated here for space). 9. Tariff Summary (Effective September 2025) All room categories and blocks carry the same tariff (inclusive of GST) as detailed in tariffs array. 10.
